channel.title: math.LO updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.LO updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Properties of Laver forcing associated with a co-ideal expressed via the Katetov order
item.description: arXiv:2601.09061v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We study variants of classical Laver forcing defined from co-ideals and analyze their combinatorial properties in terms of the Kat\v{e}tov order. In particular, we give a Kat\v{e}tov-theoretic characterization of when Laver forcing associated with a co-ideal adds Cohen reals, and we show that such forcings never add random reals. Improving a result of B{\l}aszczyk and Shelah we prove that the addition of Cohen reals and the Laver property are not equivalent, even in the case of ultrafilters. As an application, we investigate the problem of adding half Cohen reals without adding Cohen reals via tree-like forcings arising from co-ideals. We obtain several partial results and structural obstructions. Finally, we resolve several open questions from the literature concerning the one-to-one or constant property and cardinal invariants associated with ideals.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Santiago Nieto-de la Rosa, Osvaldo Guzm\'an, Ulises Ariet Ramos-Garcia

item.title: Perfectoid $C_i$ transfer
item.description: arXiv:2504.14719v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We prove a perfectoid analogue of the Ax-Kochen theorem on zeros of $p$-adic forms: Given $d\in \mathbb{N}$, there is a finite totally ramified extension $E/\mathbb{Q}_p$ such that every untilt of $\mathbb{F}_p(\!(t^{1/p^{\infty}})\!)$ containing $E$ is $C_2(d)$. We also prove a similar result for the existence of rational points in rationally connected varieties over perfectoid field extensions of $\mathbb{Q}_p^{ur}$.
item.dc:creator: Konstantinos Kartas
